name: Fragment- Demo Version
description:
Your Creator has disappeared from your world with no explanation. As the youngest among her creations, you have been tasked by the Dreamcaster with finding her and restoring balance to your little corner of the Universe.

You might just be a Little Guy, but everyone is counting on you to overcome the forces of darkness and despair!

Fragment was made in RPG Maker 2003 and is Snail Pace's very first game! This demo was made in about 6 months. The full game will be released later this year.

Fragment may contain some scary imagery and heavy subject matter, whether or not its a horror game is up to you, I guess? But it is definently an RPG with RPG mechanics.

A new trailer is in the works to reflect the change in release times.
